bddtester.core.bdd.steps

Class Steps

  • java.lang.Object
    • bddtester.core.bdd.steps.Steps
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Statusable

    public class Steps
extends java.lang.Object
implements Statusable
    Describes a BDD Scenario.
    Thus, it has the given, when, then, and methods.
    Author:
    ckeiner

      • Steps

        public Steps(java.util.List<Step> steps,
             java.util.List<Before> befores)
        Creates a BddScenario with the specified reporter and list of Steps, Befores and Afters.
        Parameters:
        befores - The list of steps to execute before each other step.
        steps - The list of BddSteps that specify this BddScenario

      • Steps

        public Steps(java.util.List<Step> steps,
             java.util.List<Before> befores,
             java.util.List<After> afters)
        Creates a BddScenario with the specified list of Steps, Befores and Afters.
        Parameters:
        steps - The list of BddSteps that specify this BddScenario
        befores - The list of steps to execute before the steps.
        afters - The list of steps to execute after the steps.

    • Method Detail

      • test

        public void test()
        Executes the BddScenario by executing each step in getSteps().
        If an exception or error occurs in the steps, the steps which weren't executed yet, are set to be skipped. Afterwards, the exception or error is re-thrown as StepException and StepError respectively.
        Should both, an exception and an error, occur, a StepException is thrown.

      • skipSteps

        public void skipSteps()
        Marks all steps as skipped.

      • addBefores

        public void addBefores(java.util.List<Before> befores)
        Adds all backgrounds to the Steps.
        Parameters:
        befores - The Befores to add.

      • addAfters

        public void addAfters(java.util.List<After> afters)
        Adds all postSteps to the Steps.
        Parameters:
        afters - The Afters to add.

      • and

        public Steps and(Steps scenario)
        Adds all steps of the specified parameter to the steps.
        Parameters:
        scenario - The Steps with the steps that should be added to the steps of this class.
        Returns:
        The current Steps.

      • and

        public Steps and(java.lang.String description,
                 java.lang.Runnable runner)
        Adds the BddStep, specified by the description and runner, to the list of BddSteps.
        The GherkinKeyword for the BddStep is "And".
        Parameters:
        description - The description of the step.
        runner - The behavior of the step.
        Returns:
        The current Steps.
